resources.string: "AI notification summary provides smart summaries of key information from notifications. Xiaomi needs to access and process notification content to provide this feature, but Xiaomi won't store this information."
通知、短信智能总结，显示更重要的内容
"智能总结通知、短信里的超长内容，并在预览列表展示摘要内容，帮助您在预览场景里快速获取重要信息。 其总结内容（包括其中的任何私密数据）将由小米进行处理，但小米不会存储这些数据。"
AI notification summary provides smart summaries of key information from notifications. This feature will slightly increase power consumption.

In order to tell whether multiple people are looking at the screen, this feature will access the front camera when a floating notification is displayed. The collected images are only used for on-device analysis of the number of people looking at the screen. When multiple people are detected, notification content will be hidden by default.

string.name: dialog_privacy_text_with_link
string.Data: Read and agree to our AI Briefing Privacy Policy
and AI Briefing Privacy Policy before using this feature.

resources.string: Due to applicable laws and regulations, ID verification is required to use AI-related features. Sign in with Xiaomi Account to be able to use this feature.
Hide notification content when multiple people are looking at your device
"Xiaomi needs to access and process notification content (which might include private information) to provide this feature, but Xiaomi won't store this information."

string.name: privacy_text_with_link
string.Data: to understand how we manage your data. For more information on this service, refer to our AI Briefing User Agreement.
